mapper.insert: insert into q_learning_habit( id, create_time, geoscore, speedscore, timescore, user_id, georecommend, timerecommend )values( #{id}, #{createTime}, #{geoscore}, #{speedscore}, #{timescore}, #{userId}, #{georecommend}, #{timerecommend} )
mapper.update: update q_learning_habit set create_time = #{createTime}, geoscore = #{geoscore}, speedscore = #{speedscore}, timescore = #{timescore}, user_id = #{userId}, georecommend = #{georecommend}, timerecommend = #{timerecommend} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, create_time as createTime, geoscore, speedscore, timescore, user_id as userId, georecommend, timerecommend from q_learning_habit where user_id = #{userId} and create_time > #{createTime} order by create_time desc
